reviews.review: игра отпад

This is a great game with a lot to offer:

Pros:
-Great for hopping in alone and multiplayer.
-Lands in that nice "creepy atmosphere but not too scary" category.
-Not a super toxic player base in my experience
-constantly adding more updates
-Helping your team is encouraged by game mechanics

Cons:
-Sometimes it can have game glitches that can crash your game. In my 100+ hours of playing this has only happened to me twice.
-My friends often have to verify their files after an update. I only had to do it once but I have a friend that has to do it every time. 
-Matching length is really unpredictable. Anywhere from 20 seconds to 5 minutes.
-A lot of content is DLC, however some you can save up for with in game points. 

Overall, I would recommend this game, especially if you have a group to play with.

4 kişi beraber girelim diye aldık , ancak 1 kere bile beraber giremedik. Katil olmak zevkli.

4 kişi girelim dedik. Ne zaman oda bulsa en az 1 kişiyi "bilinmeyen" bir hatadan dolayı odadan atıyor. Özel oyun dışında 4 kişi giremiyoruz. Kaç yıllık oyunda böyle hataların olması aşırı derecede mantıksız. Oyunu yayınladıktan sonra katil getirmek dışında hiçbir şey yapmamışlar anlaşılan.
4 kişi oyuna girmeye çalıştığımızda birisini lobiden atıyor. Beraber girmek istediğimizde çok zorlanıyoruz.

Game's good some times, every now and again there is the toxic face camping and tunneling killer or survivor that seems to have infinite speed at their disposal, every update seems to break something which can lead to some pretty funny interactions in game, I played on playstation pretty much since it was released moving to pc has taken some getting used to but it plays and just feels much better on pc, Kinda sucks that when switching over to pc I lost all the progress and killers and survivors and charms I had on console. I'd recommend waiting for a sale before getting it though as unless your willing to spend millions of hours your gunna be stuck with the very few basic killers available in base game, DLC is pretty much a requirement to get full enjoyment from this game as the DLC killers all have some pretty cool abilities while basegame is all kinda similar and not very enjoyable

Впечатлений много,как и доната который совершенно не подходит этой игре.Встречались и с теми кто моментально сбивал с ног,встречали и тех кто всю команду за 45 секунд на крюки перевешал,и это уже реально бесит.В игре также встречается тот вид маньяков который без доната,Эта игра по прежнему мне нравиться и я говорю так,ведь я делал перерыв с прошлого (лета 2020),до этого момента,до (мая 2021) и с уверенностью могу сказать,что игра постепенно и очень уверенно умирает.
Arkadaşlar, ben bir çukura düştüm siz düşmeyin.

発売されてからまもなく５年を迎えるにも関わらず定期的なアップデートにより飽きを感じさせにくいゲーム。
ただ、ゲーム自体がかなり研究されているため、多くの知識を頭に入れる必要がある。特に始めたばかりは楽しさを見出す前にやられることが多い。
そのわからないことだらけの状態を抜けることができれば、キラー・サバイバーとの駆け引きを大いに楽しむことができる。
Switch、PS4などとクロスプレイ対応しているので様々な人と遊ぶことができる。多少のラグを感じることもあるがプレイする分にはほとんど問題ない。

バイオハザードコラボも控えていることから始めるタイミングが遅いということはないと思います。
